double Source_Neutronique_VDF::calculer_Tmoyenne ( ) [virtual]

Implements Source_Neutronique.

Definition at line 49 of file Source_Neutronique_VDF.cpp.

References MorEqn::equation(), Equation_base::inconnue(), la_zone, and Champ_Inc::valeurs().

{
  double T=0.;
  const int nb_elem = la_zone->nb_elem();
  const DoubleTab& temp = equation().inconnue().valeurs();
  for (int i=0; i<nb_elem; i++)
    T += temp(i);

  T=T/nb_elem;
  return T;
}
